title: GoCode Zone Learning Platform Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Create Home page with hero section, Join Discord button, and Why Join benefits
acceptanceCriteria: Home page displays 'Welcome to GoCode Zone' as the main heading
Subtitle reads 'Learn Go from Beginner to Advanced'
Join Discord button is prominently displayed
Why Join section lists exactly 4 benefits: Beginner-friendly lessons, Weekly quizzes & tests, Coding challenges, Supportive community

file_operations.description: Create Home page component with hero section displaying 'Welcome to GoCode Zone' title, 'Learn Go from Beginner to Advanced' subtitle, prominent Join Discord button, and Why Join section with 4 benefits (Beginner-friendly lessons, Weekly quizzes & tests, Coding challenges, Supportive community). Include the generated hero image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-gopher.dim_1200x400.png and benefits icons at frontend/public/assets/generated/benefits-icons.dim_400x400.png as static assets in the UI.
Add route for Home page at root path '/' and wire it into the router configuration.

requirements.summary: Create About page explaining Go, GoCode Zone, and target audiences
acceptanceCriteria: About page includes a section explaining Go (Golang)
About page describes GoCode Zone's mission and purpose
About page lists three target audiences: Beginners, Students, Developers

file_operations.description: Create About page component with sections explaining what Go (Golang) is, what GoCode Zone is, and who it's for (Beginners, Students, Developers).
Add route for About page at '/about' and wire it into the router configuration.

requirements.summary: Create Syllabus/Course page with 4 units and their details
acceptanceCriteria: Syllabus page lists all 4 units with exact titles provided
Each unit displays learning objectives/topics
Each unit clearly indicates Quiz + Big Test are included

file_operations.description: Create Course/Syllabus page component displaying 4 units with exact titles (Unit 1 – Getting Started, Unit 2 – Variables & Data Types, Unit 3 – If & Switch, Unit 4 – Loops), learning objectives for each, and Quiz + Big Test included notation.
Add route for Course page at '/course' and wire it into the router configuration.

requirements.summary: Create Join/Discord page with join button, invite links, and community info
acceptanceCriteria: Join page displays a prominent 'Join Our Discord' button
Page includes placeholder for Discord invite links
Page explains the post-join experience
Community rules are mentioned or linked

file_operations.description: Create Join/Discord page component with large 'Join Our Discord' button, Discord invite link placeholders, explanation of post-join experience, and community rules mention.
Add route for Join page at '/join' and wire it into the router configuration.

requirements.summary: Create VIP/Premium page describing benefits, pricing, and extra features
acceptanceCriteria: VIP page lists VIP membership benefits
Page includes pricing section
Page highlights extra features: private help, advanced lessons, projects

file_operations.description: Create VIP/Premium page component describing VIP membership benefits, pricing information, and extra features (private help, advanced lessons, projects).
Add route for VIP page at '/vip' and wire it into the router configuration.

requirements.summary: Create Privacy Policy page with effective date, contact, and data handling info
acceptanceCriteria: Privacy Policy page displays an effective date
Page includes contact information
Page contains clear data handling explanations

file_operations.description: Create Privacy Policy page component with effective date, contact method, and data handling explanation sections.
Add route for Privacy Policy page at '/privacy' and wire it into the router configuration.

requirements.summary: Add Testimonials section to display user feedback
acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials section exists and can display multiple testimonials
Section includes placeholder testimonial content

file_operations.description: Create Testimonials component that displays user feedback and community experiences with placeholder testimonial content.
Import and render the Testimonials component on the Home page to display user feedback.

requirements.summary: Add FAQ section to answer common questions
acceptanceCriteria: FAQ section is present with at least 3-5 common questions
Questions and answers are clearly formatted

file_operations.description: Create FAQ component with at least 3-5 common questions about the platform and courses, with clearly formatted questions and answers.
Import and render the FAQ component on the Home page to answer common questions.

requirements.summary: Add Contact form for user inquiries with frontend submission handling
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes fields for name, email, and message
Form has validation and submission handling
Backend stores or processes contact submissions

file_operations.description: Create ContactForm component with fields for name, email, and message. Include form validation and submission handling that calls the backend onContact method from backend.d.ts interface.
Create Contact page component that renders the ContactForm component.
Add route for Contact page at '/contact' and wire it into the router configuration.

requirements.summary: Create site-wide Footer with Discord link, site name, year, and Privacy Policy link
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays on all pages
Footer includes Discord link placeholder
Footer shows 'GoCode Zone' and current year
Footer links to Privacy Policy page

file_operations.description: Create Footer component containing Discord link placeholder, 'GoCode Zone' website name, current year, and link to Privacy Policy page at '/privacy'.
Import and render Footer component in the main app layout so it displays on all pages.

requirements.summary: Implement site-wide navigation linking to all pages
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu is accessible from all pages
All required pages are linked in navigation
Navigation is responsive and user-friendly

file_operations.description: Create Navigation component with links to all pages: Home (/), About (/about), Course (/course), Join Discord (/join), VIP (/vip), Contact (/contact), and Privacy Policy (/privacy). Ensure responsive and user-friendly design.
Import and render Navigation component in the main app layout so it's accessible from all pages.

requirements.summary: Apply cohesive educational design theme across all pages
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share consistent design language
Color scheme and typography support readability and learning focus
Layout promotes easy navigation and content hierarchy

file_operations.description: Update global styles to apply cohesive visual design theme conveying professionalism and approachability for a learning community. Define consistent color palette emphasizing trust and clarity, typography supporting readability, and base layout patterns suitable for educational content.
Extend Tailwind configuration with custom theme colors, typography, and spacing utilities that support the educational design theme, ensuring consistency across all pages.
